ygData.subject: Re: Alliance
ygData.msgSnippet: Stop playing council member, LN... If something isn t in her bio it doens t mean that her character didn t have it with her.

Stop playing council member, LN... If something isn't in her bio it 
doens't mean that her character didn't have it with her. 


On 19 Jul 2001, at 20:23, Legendarynemasis@... wrote:

> OOC: Airly.. I will accept that absorbing thing however as for using
> it to better herself I will ignore that since that entire energy
> absorbing and bettering thing is not listed anywhere in
> Blacknightmares bio. Which I just looked at, and if it suddenly
> "appeared" there I would be very suspicious of it. Also note that
> energy from sparks doesnt act like normal energy. Since Blacknightmare
> isnt a creation of the Bamphomet and the energy is specifically
> created to be used solely by those he creates it would have a very bad
> negative effect on blacknightmare if she absorbed it and/or tried to
> use it to improve anything. I will not reply until you have replied to
> this. 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > OOC: GREAT JOB Legendary Nemesys!!!!!  but let me ask you what's
> > infectrons beliefs, if their balief are "Peace" why Zero is chasing
> > them?
> > 
> > 
> > Blacknightmare felt chaotical energy  struk her but she would 
> fight; 
> > like the three ladies she could aborb any type of energy and use it
> > against her enemies, but she has a diference: she could use that
> > energy to improve herself.... but that happen rarely. She didn't 
> know 
> > what Chaotical energy could do but she started to absorb the energy.
> > 
> > Darkfate smirked and said"I will be a prisioner without worth, 
> unless 
> > you try to force the troops that I bring here to work for you."
>
